## Action On XP Gain

---

_Power Type_

Executes an [Entity Action Type](https://epoli-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/powertypes/action_on_xp_gain) when the player gains experience.

Type ID: `epoli:action_on_xp_gain`

---

### Examples

```json
{
    "type": "epoli:action_on_xp_gain",
    "entity_action": {
        "type": "origins:execute_command",
        "command": "say Gained XP :)"
    }
}
```
This example will execute the command `Say Gained XP :)` on the player when they gain experience.
